name: agent
content: <situation name="{SITNAME}" mapAllAttributes="Y">			<class name="Logfile_Unix" />			<slot slotName="msg">				<literalString value="LogFile : $KLO_LOGFILEPROFILEEVENTS.CustomSlot3$ : $KLO_LOGFILEPROFILEEVENTS.CustomSlot2$ : $KLO_LOGFILEPROFILEEVENTS.CustomSlot1$" />			</slot>			<slot slotName="eventclass">				<mappedAttribute name="KLO_LOGFILEPROFILEEVENTS.CustomSlot1" />			</slot>			<slot slotName="HtId">				<mappedAttribute name="KLO_LOGFILEPROFILEEVENTS.CustomSlot2" />			</slot>			<slot slotName="probe">				<mappedAttribute name="KLO_LOGFILEPROFILEEVENTS.CustomSlot3" />			</slot>			<slot slotName="threshold">				<mappedAttribute name="KLO_LOGFILEPROFILEEVENTS.CustomSlot4" />			</slot>			<slot slotName="severity">				<mappedAttribute name="KLO_LOGFILEPROFILEEVENTS.CustomSlot5" />			</slot>			<slot slotName="profile">				<mappedAttribute name="KLO_LOGFILEPROFILEEVENTS.CustomSlot6" />			</slot>		</situation>
